Dr. Charles Jacobs, the President of Americans for Peace and Tolerance, will discuss his article at Breitbart titled “The Syrian School System: What Syrian Refugees Learn About Jews in Class.”

Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.

Former Secret Service officer Gary Bryne will join us again live in studio to continue where we left off yesterday in discussing his book Crisis of Character: A White House Secret Service Officer Discloses His Firsthand Experience with Hillary, Bill, and How They Operate.

On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM EST, Breitbart Executive Chairman Stephen K. Bannon will discuss Hillary Clinton’s role in the Benghazi attack and its aftermath.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Political analyst and Democratic campaign veteran Mark Hannah will discuss his new book The Best “Worst President”: What the Right Gets Wrong About Barack Obama.
Veteran award-winning investigative journalist Sharyl Attkisson will join us in-studio to break down the Benghazi Committee Report released on Tuesday.
Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy will also weigh in on the report and Hillary’s role in Benghazi.
Matthew Tyrmand will discuss George Soros and Brexit and the “Clinton Cash” documentary distribution in Poland.
